cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the joint design of control and communication scheduling in a Networked Control System (NCS), which is a topic that falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the use of Age-of-Information (AoI) for solving control/estimation problems in an NCS, which is a topic that falls under the categories of Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI). The paper also involves optimization problems, which is a topic that falls under the category of Mathematical Optimization (cs.MA). Finally, the paper discusses the use of heuristic algorithms, which is a topic that falls under the category of Machine Learning (cs.LG).
